description: This file defines a Flutter widget for editing or creating maintenance events, including form fields for event details, date picker, color selection, and integration with provider-based state management.

classes.name: EventEditorSheet
classes.description: A Flutter widget for creating or editing maintenance events in a modal bottom sheet form.
